source_objects.title: Business Strategy
source_objects.description: Become a master strategist with courses on the following: business strategy, performance innovation, marketing strategy, customer loyalty and more.

items.title: Lean Hoshin Kanri Strategic Planning & Execution
items.headline: Learn step-by-step procedure for Strategic Planning & Execution using Hoshin Kanri
objectives_summary: Learn strategic planning and execution as using in Lean Management or Lean Manufacturing
Develop Hoshin Kanri Strategy Implementation roadmap in your organization
Create X Matrix using Lean Management for strategy planning and execution

items.title: Six Sigma Green Belt Kano Analysis Specialist Certification
items.headline: Get Trained to Prioritize Customer Needs with Kano Analysis and Achieve Kano Analysis Specialist Certification in 1 hour
objectives_summary: Master the Ability to Systematically Identify and Prioritize Your Customer Requirements
Specialize Your Skills in Exploring Your Customer's Stated and Latent Needs
Become Proficient in Acquiring Laser Sharp Focus on only those Requirements that are Your Customers Care about

Segmenting & Profiling Business

items.title: Complete RPA lifecycle for RPA Managers & Business Analysts

visible_instructors.title: Tony Walker
visible_instructors.job_title: Passionate about empowering you in digital transformation!

items.headline: Analyse, Build, Test, Launch, Support your Robotic Process Automation. RPA development lifecycle (SDLC)

KNOW about Robotic Process Automation (RPA) lifecycle; IDENTIFY, ANALYSE, DESIGN, BUILD, TEST, LAUNCH & SUPPORT
WATCH a demo of how a business analyst and a developer talk an RPA bot through the whole process

items.title: Grow organically your instagram and build your business

objectives_summary: By the end of the class, you'll have the necessary skills to improve your content and the appearence of your account
increase organically your followers
Monetize your following

items.title: The Ultimate Guide to Selling Private Label Products

objectives_summary: Create products that smash the competition

Be able to not just private label a product but create a brand that people can interact with.

objectives_summary: Fundamental knowledge of the smart grid architecture.

items.title: NAME For Success - Ultimate Blueprint for Naming A Business
items.headline: Learn how to create a great memorable name for your business that will start your path to success.
objectives_summary: Create a memorable name for your business
Understand the qualities of a successful business name

items.title: MBA - Strategic Management  - Manage Innovation
items.headline: Learn how to manage and grow a disruptive innovation next the core business
objectives_summary: Understand why it is so challenging to manage disruptive innovations next to a core business
Make better decisions within corporates to deal with managing innovations

items.title: Art of War by Sun Tzu - the Tao of Leadership
items.headline: A focus on the spiritual elements of Art of War for self awareness in leadership and strategy.
objectives_summary: Understand the central message of Sun Tzu's The Art of War without having to spend hours reading the book and commentary on it.
Appreciate why The Art of War is a classic text in Leadership Development.
Focus on the importance of Self Awareness to great leadership.
